text: Sore kara musa wa, ware (to no kaiken) no toki no tame ni jibun no min o 70-ri eranda. Sonotoki dai jishin ga kare-ra o osottanode, kare wa itta. `Omo yo, anata ga moshi o konomi ni nattanaraba,(kono koto no) mae ni, kare-ra to watashi o horobosa retadeshou. Anata wa watashi-tachi no naka no muchinamono no okonai no tame ni, watashi-tachi o horobosa reru nodesu ka, koreha, tada anata no kokoromi ni sugimasen. Anata wa o nozomi no mono o mayowa se, mata o nozomi no mono o michibika remasu. Anata wa watashi-tachi no aigo-shadearimasu. Sorede, watashi-tachi o yurushite, jihi o hodokoshite kudasai. Anata wa, mottomo kan'yona okata de irasshaimasu
